author: trawick
msg: When deciding on the default address family for listening sockets,
make sure we can actually bind to an AF_INET6 socket before
deciding that we should default to AF_INET6.  This fixes a startup
problem on certain levels of OpenUNIX.

author: mjc
msg: Add in missing CVE name; make SECURITY entries more consistant

author: mjc
msg: Add 3 new CVE names for old (circa 2000) security issues; rearrange
security changes so they are consistant
